Deprecated List

Global _interror (char *file, uint32 line, char *format,...)
For internal use only. Please use #logerror instead.

Global _logerror (char *file, uint32 line, char *format,...)
For internal use only. Please use #logerror instead.

Global _logerrorsys (char *file, uint32 line, int32 err, char *format,...)
For internal use only. Please use #logerror instead.

Global msg_getl_bot (int num, int language, int checkbot)
Don't use this one, use the macro msg_getl instead. It'll save you some effort.

Global usr_insystem (char *userid, int checkinvis, struct shmuserrec **buf)
Do not use this function. It is easy to misuse it. Please use the simpler usr_insys() function that does not suffer from the same problems. This function is for internal use only.
